Image: Movie Name: Schedule:
{{s.movieName}} {{s.hour}}:{{s.minutes}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ShowingService } from '../services/showing.service'; import { ShowingModel } from '../models/showing.model'; import { ScheduleService } from '../services/schedule.service'; import { ScheduleModel } from '../models/schedule.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-showing', templateUrl: './list-showing.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-showing.component.css'] }) export class ListShowingComponent implements OnInit { showings? : ShowingModel[]; constructor(private showingService : ShowingService, private scheduleService:ScheduleService){} ngOnInit(): void { try{ this.showingService.getShowings().subscribe(data=>{ console.log("Info GET Showing: "+data); this.showings = data; }); /* this.showings?.forEach((s) =>{ let id = s.scheduleID; if(id!=undefined){ this.scheduleService.getScheduleById(id).subscribe(d =>{ this.schedules.push(d); }); } }); */ }catch(e){ console.log("error: "+ e); } } getSchedule(idS:Number):String{ let h = 0; let m = 0; this.scheduleService.getScheduleById(idS).subscribe(d =>{ if(d.hour!=undefined){ h = d.hour; } }); return h+":"+m; } }
